Loose fit denim washed blue

230 EUR
Totême’s loose fit denim made in Italy from a rigid cotton fabric that is faded for a vintage wash. They are cut to a straight loose silhouette that falls from the waist to a full length. This pair has a button fastening. Let the leg ends drape over open shoes like mules.

₩321,000 KRW

Estimated shipping: April 20

Loose fit denim washed blue

Totême’s loose fit denim made in Italy from a rigid cotton fabric that is faded for a vintage wash. They are cut to a straight loose silhouette that falls from the waist to a full length. This pair has a button fastening. Let the leg ends drape over open shoes like mules.

  • The model is 179cm/5’10” tall and wears a size 27/34
  • Washed blue
  • 100% Cotton, rigid
  • 30°C Machine wash
  • Fits big, take one size down
  • Made in Italy

Shipping to Europe

  • DPD Standard Home delivery: 2-4 business days, 10 EUR
  • UPS Standard: 2-4 business days, 15 EUR
  • UPS Express: 1-2 business days, 20 EUR

VAT is included in in the product price.

Shipping outside Europe

  • UPS Express Export: 2-4 business days, 20 EUR
  • DHL Express Export: 2-4 business days, 30 EUR

Taxes and duties are included in the product price.

Cancellations

Please note, orders need to be canceled within 1 hour.

Shipping information: due to a change of warehouses there may be slight delays in shipping at the moment.

We have a 14 day returns policy, from the day you receive your order. This applies to full priced and sale items.

Register you return here.

Exchanges

If you want to exchange an item for a different size or color, please return it and place a new order.

Monday to Friday: 9am – 5pm CET

Chat
